title: [1.14.4]怎么用指令给武器高级附魔
author: Clever_Emperor

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
Clever_Emperor 发表于 2019-8-16 01:22
为啥服务器里用不成单机可以啊
服务器这样：
/minecraft:give @a minecraft:book{display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"物品名字\",\"color\":\"red\"}",Lore:["{\"text\":\"介绍1\",\"color\":\"blue\"}","{\"text\":\"介绍2\",\"color\":\"green\"}"]},Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:sharpness",lvl:10000},{id:"minecraft:unbreaking",lvl:10000}]}

replies.author: TNTcraftHIM
replies.txt_content:
如果嫌麻烦可以用插件
EnchantExtreme，附魔的名字都是中文的
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-536717-1-1.html
